title: Rioter for 1000th win :D
body: Hi, I'm at the milestone for 1,000th win and would love for a Rioter to help me get it.  Special request for Kateykhaos or IronStylus if possible.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

When are you free to play? :D
Hey Katey, missed your invite earlier.  Would you be free at 5 central time tomorrow?  Or any specific point after that?  Bit easier to catch ya if i know when to be waiting :)
I went ahead and added you, to make things a bit easier. :P
Anytime between now and 10 PM central would work well for me :)
